data.description:
“Self Illumination” is a soul-consciousness meditation experience that presents the meditation practices and techniques of Magic Diamond of Group for the first time in immersive virtual reality.

This initial VR experience presents a ten-minute meditation where the user experiences themselves as a soul — a being of light that governs the human body. It is this being, also referred to as a consciousness, that thinks, emotes, and experiences life through this human body made of flesh and bone.

Regular content updates will feature additional in-depth meditation experiences exploring the soul, consciousness, and our connection to the supreme soul.

ABOUT MAGIC DIAMOND OF GROUP
Spiritual Enlightenment in Scientific Way

We are a non-profit spiritual organization, with the mission to help people find their inner selves through Ancient Rajyog Meditation practices. 

SCIENCE OF SPIRITUALITY & SPIRITUALITY OF SCIENCE
At a superficial level, the two streams of knowledge—Science & Spirituality may appear to be contradicting: Science involves systematic study, based on evidence and driven by reasoning and logic. Spirituality involves study of metaphysical energies based on realization and is driven by faith. However, science and spirituality are two sides of the same coin. Both the streams aim to find the ultimate truths so as to improve the human living. Thus, the integration of modern science and ancient spirituality will enable us to widen the scope of knowledge and to give it a new dimension.
